1.text: Benjamin was the father of Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, Aharah the third,

2.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

3.text: The sons of Bela: Addar, Gera, Abihud,

6.text: These were the descendants of Ehud who were the heads of the families living in Geba and were exiled to Manahath:

7.text: Naaman, Ahijah, and Gera, who carried them into exile and who was the father of Uzza and Ahihud.

8.text: Shaharaim had sons in the country of Moab after he had divorced his wives Hushim and Baara.

9.text: His sons by his wife Hodesh: Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam,

10.text: Jeuz, Sachia, and Mirmah. These were his sons, heads of families.

11.text: He also had sons by Hushim: Abitub and Elpaal.

12.text: The sons of Elpaal: Eber, Misham, Shemed (who built Ono and Lod with its villages),

13.text: and Beriah and Shema (who were the heads of families living in Aijalon and who drove out the inhabitants of Gath).

16.text: Michael, Ishpah, and Joha were the sons of Beriah.

18.text: Ishmerai, Izliah, and Jobab were the sons of Elpaal.

21.text: Adaiah, Beraiah, and Shimrath were the sons of Shimei.

25.text: Iphdeiah, and Penuel were the sons of Shashak.

27.text: Jaareshiah, Elijah, and Zichri were the sons of Jeroham.

28.text: All these were heads of families, the chiefs according to their genealogies, and they lived in Jerusalem.

29.text: Jeiel the father of Gibeon lived in Gibeon. His wife’s name was Maacah,

30.text: and Abdon was his firstborn son, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,

32.text: and Mikloth, who was the father of Shimeah. They too lived alongside their relatives in Jerusalem.

33.text: Ner was the father of Kish, Kish was the father of Saul, and Saul was the father of Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Esh-baal.

34.text: The son of Jonathan: Merib-baal, and Merib-baal was the father of Micah.

35.text: The sons of Micah: Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.

36.text: Ahaz was the father of Jehoaddah, Jehoaddah was the father of Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri, and Zimri was the father of Moza.

37.text: Moza was the father of Binea. Raphah was his son, Eleasah his son, and Azel his son.

38.text: Azel had six sons, and these were their names: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.

39.text: The sons of his brother Eshek: Ulam was his firstborn, Jeush second, and Eliphelet third.

40.text: The sons of Ulam were mighty men of valor, archers, and they had many sons and grandsons—150 in all. All these were the descendants of Benjamin.
